objects.text:
• ERGONOMIC RECLINING DESIGN
• BUILT-IN SPEAKERS
• ADJUSTABLE FOOTREST
• MEMORY FOAM PADDING

product_details.name: GTPLAYER Gaming Chair with Speakers, Video Game Chairs with Footrest, PC Gamer Chairs for Adults - Padded High Back Ergonomic Reclining Silla Gamer, Linkage Armrest, Ace Pro, WineRed
product_details.description: Brand: GTPLAYER. Color: Winered. Product Dimensions: 20.1"D x 18.1"W x 50"H. Back Style: Solid Back. Special Feature: Flexible. Product Care Instructions: Wipe Clean. Unit Count: 1.0 Count. Recommended Uses For Product: Gaming. Maximum Weight Recommendation: 300 Pounds. Style: Leather. Pattern: Striped. Finish Type: Brushed. Room Type: Game Recreation Room. Age Range (Description): Adult. Shape: L-Shaped. Model Name: ACE-PRO. Arm Style: With arms. Surface Recommendation: Hard Floor. Seat Back Interior Height: 31.49 Inches. Furniture base movement: Swivel. Indoor/Outdoor Usage: Indoor. Seat Height: 21.64 Inches. Seat Depth: 18.11 inches. Fill Material: Memory Foam. Leg Style: Tapered Leg. Reclining Position Count: 2. Tilting: Yes. Form Factor: Metal. Item Weight: 42 pounds.

banner_details:
The banner showcases a modern and dynamic promotional layout for a gaming chair. The left half features a dark geometric background divided into four rectangles with overlapping diagonal lines and faint circular accents. The visuals draw attention to the product using layered SVG background elements. The top of the banner includes a bold, futuristic heading ("heading") in white, followed by a red subheading ("subheading") and a gray tagline ("tagline"). Below them, product features are listed in neat white bullet points ("description"). The price is prominently displayed in bold white ("price"). A red call-to-action button ("cta_button") with white text ("cta") sits at the bottom. A large, detailed image of the gaming chair is positioned on the right side ("product_image"), enhancing visual appeal and focus.

**Color Palette:**
- Dark Maroon (#2A0A0F)
- Deep Red (#BB3333)
- Black (#1A1A1A)
- Charcoal (#3A0A14)
- Light Gray (#CCCCCC)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image showcases a premium gaming chair dominated by a bold and rich burgundy red color (#8A2B38), which evokes luxury, intensity, and energy—perfect for gaming gear advertising. The chair's body uses this primary red tone seamlessly, while subtle stitching details and panel designs create texture and depth. Accents of matte black (#1C1C1C) in the base, armrests, and mechanisms contrast sharply with the red, giving the design a grounded, modern feel. Slight chrome detailing (#C0C0C0) adds a sleek, sophisticated highlight without overpowering the core colors. This palette blends strength with sophistication, ideal for high-impact, stylish advertisement banners.
